description.english: Find and talk to the Mohan to embark on the adventure of recovering his sacred objects.
description.spanish: Encuentra y habla con el Mohán para emprender la aventura de recuperar sus objetos sagrados.

description.english: Find the herbalist and talk to her to find out what to do.
description.spanish: Encuentra a la Hierbatera y habla con ella para saber lo que debes hacer.

description.english: Mr Ed needs your help to reopen his business, please help him!!!!.
description.spanish: Don Ed necesita de tu ayuda para reabrir su negocio, ayúdalo por favor!!!.

description.english: This pot will help improve the Mohan's mobility, find it and start more exciting adventures.
description.spanish: Esta olla ayudará a mejorar la movilidad del Mohán, encuéntrala y empieza aventuras más emocionantes.

displayName.english: Helping the lady at the bank
displayName.spanish: Ayudar a la señora del banco

description.english: This poor lady lost her bank key, help her get it back, and you can continue with your mission.
description.spanish: Esta pobre señora perdió la llave del banco, ayuda a recuperarla, y podrás continuar con tu misión.

displayName.spanish: Recuperar los objetos perdidos de los duendes

description.english: These mischievous friends will not return to the forest unless you return their lost items.
description.spanish: Esto traviesos amigos no volverán al bosque si no le devuelves sus objetos perdidos.

description.english: This mystical object will restore the Mohan's health, help him regain his powers!!!!
description.spanish: Este objeto místico recobrara la salud del Mohán, ayúdalo a recuperar sus poderes!!!.

description.english: This poor old lady needs your help, don't delay in helping her!!!!.
description.spanish: Esta pobre viejecita necesita de tu ayuda, no te demores en ayudarla!!!.

displayName.english: Recovering the gold doll of the Mohan
displayName.spanish: Recuperar la muñeca de oro del Mohán

description.english: This last sacred object will allow the Mohan to recover all its power, find it quickly!!!!
description.spanish: Este ultimo objeto sagrado permitirá que el Mohán recupere todo su poder, encuéntrala rápidamente!!!.

displayName.english: Helping people and the Mohan to their homes
displayName.spanish: Ayudar a las personas y al Mohán a sus hogares

description.english: You must help the people return to the village and the Mohan return to the river.
description.spanish: Debes ayudar a que las personas vuelvan al pueblo y el Mohán vuelva al rio.
